analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/19/0x1c43535d06b494a1d6cb7cb550f5689161303aaa.sol:
	Contract HypeRideToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0x1c43535d06b494a1d6cb7cb550f5689161303aaa.sol#206-207)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
